com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.util

Class DefaultCameraConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.kinesisvideo.util.DefaultCameraConfigurationHelper

  • public class DefaultCameraConfigurationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create a default camera configuration. Tries to find a combination of supported camera resolution, encoder configuration, etc. The configuration produced is expected to be used as is to instantiate a working camera media source
